name: Ayakashi: The Mystery of the Sea
name_original: Ayakashi: The Mystery of the Sea
description:
THANK YOU FOR PLAYING OUR GAME! 
Please, if you use this game for streaming or a review video, sent us the link so we can share with people :)

Neto:
Email: cicero.projects@gmail.com
Twitter: twitter.com/platyboss

Igor:
Email: igorfelga@gmail.com
FB: https://pt-br.facebook.com/igor.felga

We just develop games for fun, so there's many things that we cannot make (as sounds and music), and for this reason, we're using free assets, as listed below:

Waves: https://opengameart.org/content/water-waves
Character attack: https://opengameart.org/content/3-melee-sounds
Ship cracking sound: https://opengameart.org/content/cracking-sounds
Monster sound: https://elements.envato.com/pt-br/monster-roar-ZN74RKW
Scream attack: https://elements.envato.com/pt-br/male-scream-042-8APSVDS
Game sountrack: https://pixabay.com/music/upbeat-action-drums-sport-106841/
Game over sountrack: https://opengameart.org/content/game-over
Game over scream: https://elements.envato.com/pt-br/male-scream-066-5X8QB8A
Main menu sountrack: https://pixabay.com/music/mystery-deep-sea-exploration-7399/ 

Feel free to sent us your feedback and suggest any improvement!
